articles.title: Vettel admits he was ‘hoping for more’ from maiden season with Aston Martin - Formula 1 RSS UK
articles.description: Sebastian Vettel is readying for his second season at Aston Martin but remarked that his first with the Silverstone-based squad wasn’t ideal when it came to results, as he hopes for more this year.
